addDependencies

public void addDependencies(T source,
                            T... targets)
                     throws DependencyResolverException
Adds direct dependencies from source to each of targets.

Parameters:
source - source; may not be null
targets - targets; may not be null; each element may be null
Throws:
DependencyResolverException - if an error occurs

addDependency

public void addDependency(T source,
                          T target)
                   throws DependencyResolverException
Adds a direct dependency from given source to specified target.

Parameters:
source - source; may not be null
target - target; may be null
Throws:
DependencyResolverException - if failed to add dependency.

removeDependencies

public void removeDependencies(T source,
                               T... targets)
Removes direct dependencies from specified source to each of specified targets.

Parameters:
source - source; may not be null
targets - targets; may not be null; each element may be null

hasDependencies

public boolean hasDependencies(T source,
                               T... targets)
Checks if given source has direct or indirect dependencies to all of targets.

Parameters:
source - source; may not be null
targets - targets; may not be null; each element may be null
Returns:
true if all targets are dependent from source; false otherwise

hasDependency

public boolean hasDependency(T source,
                             T target)
Checks if there is any direct or indirect dependency from source to target.

Parameters:
source - source; may not be null
target - target; may be null
Returns:
true if there is a dependency; false otherwise

getDependencyPaths

public List<List<T>> getDependencyPaths(T source,
                                        T target)
Finds all direct or indirect dependency paths from given source to specified target.

Parameters:
source - source
target - target
Returns:
dependency paths from source to target.

getSingleGroup

public List<T> getSingleGroup()
Returns a single group of all dependencies in order.

Returns:
a single dependency group

getHorizontalGroups

public List<List<T>> getHorizontalGroups()
Returns a list of horizontal dependency groups. Each group can be processed concurrently but all elements in a group must be processed in order.

Returns:
horizontal groups

getVerticalGroups

public List<List<T>> getVerticalGroups()
Returns a list of vertical dependency groups. Each element in a group can be processed concurrently but all groups must be processed in order.

Returns:
vertical groups
